resources.string:
As a graduate student from MAKAUT, (W.B). and Neotia Institute of Technology Management and Science, I have acquired a comprehensive understanding of core Java, data structures, and algorithms. I have also gained practical experience in Android Development, where I have developed several applications using Android Studio.

 In addition to my academic achievements, I have actively participated in various coding competitions and hackathons, where I have consistently demonstrated my ability to solve complex problems efficiently. I have also completed 500+ DSA problems on various platforms such as Geeks for Geeks, LeetCode,Code chef, etc. 

Furthermore, I have a strong foundation in DSA,JDBC, MySQL, OOPs, XML, and Android Development. I am proficient in using developer tools like IntelliJ IDEA
